item.title: Netflix Adapts Hit Korean Reality Show ‘Physical 100’ in Italy
item.description: “Physical 100,” which is the first unscripted Korean show to top Netflix’s non-English global charts, is getting an Italian adaptation, marking the format’s first European redo. The streaming gi
